EmailTemplate.name: SR Assignment template
EmailTemplate.subject: New Service Request was created from the {!Service_Request__c.Case_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
A new Global Customer Committee (GCC) Rail has been assigned to you. It was assigned from {!Service_Request__c.Name}. Updates will be required prior to the next GCC conference. Please contact Linda Fiumara or Alejandro Gonzalez Montesinos with any questions.
Please click on the below link to view the details.
Click to view Service Request
